author: wtopstaff
title: Heat-Hawks, Box
text:
By The Associated Press October 18, 2015 9:32 pm MIAMI (101) 
Deng 2-4 0-0 5, Bosh 5-10 4-4 14, Andersen 1-4 0-0 2, Dragic 1-5 2-2 5, Wade 3-9 1-2 7, McRoberts 0-2 0-0 0, Green 6-13 4-4 19, Chalmers 2-6 1-2 6, Stoudemire 0-2 0-0 0, Richardson 1-7 0-0 2, Johnson 3-5 0-0 7, Ennis 8-13 1-3 19, Benson 3-10 6-8 12, Hawkins 1-1 0-0 3, Kelley 0-1 0-0 0. Bazemore 2-5 3-4 8, Millsap 3-6 2-2 8, Horford 4-9 0-0 8, Teague 1-8 2-2 5, Korver 3-5 2-2 10, Muscala 2-3 0-0 4, Sefolosha 1-4 2-2 4, Hardaway Jr. 2-8 3-3 7, Mack 4-7 0-0 10, Scott 9-13 1-1 19, Tavares 2-2 3-4 7, Patterson 0-5 2-2 2. 3-Point Goals_Miami 10-30 (Green 3-8, Ennis 2-3, Chalmers 1-1, Hawkins 1-1, Johnson 1-2, Deng 1-3, Dragic 1-5, McRoberts 0-1, Wade 0-1, Richardson 0-2, Bosh 0-3), Atlanta 6-22 (Korver 2-2, Mack 2-3, Bazemore 1-3, Teague 1-5, Sefolosha 0-1, Horford 0-1, Millsap 0-1, Scott 0-1, Hardaway Jr. 0-2, Patterson 0-3). Fouled Out_None. Rebounds_Miami 52 (Andersen, Benson 7), Atlanta 54 (Scott 8). Assists_Miami 26 (Chalmers 7), Atlanta 23 (Patterson 4). Total Fouls_Miami 16, Atlanta 24. A_13,038 (18,729). Topics:
